title: Encore of Episode 27: Losing Alaska
description: We didn't hear very much about climate change during this election cycle — and social science research might give us some insight as to why not. This week, an encore of one of our favorite episodes about why it's so hard for us to wrap our heads around climate change.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
